attributes.action: Control Immigration and get a grip of our country's borders, PUT THE GREAT BACK INTO GREAT BRITAIN!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets sort our borders out and control the influx of immigrants, they are destroying our once fantastic country's infastructure and erroding our common values!! Come on Britain stand up for yourself!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
